      • data

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DataSet> data
        An ArrayList of data objects. Each data object stores the details pertaining to one row of the dataSet. This is for the Training Data

      • testData

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DataSet> testData
        An ArrayList of data objects. Each data object stores the details pertaining to one row of the dataSet. This is for the Testing Data

      • matrix

        public static int[][] matrix
        A matrix which stores the numeric values in the matrix according to values stored in the DataRef Class. This is for the Training Data

      • testMatrix

        public static int[][] testMatrix
        A matrix which stores the numeric values in the matrix according to values stored in the DataRef Class. This is for the Testing Data

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • runID3

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Tree> runID3(int[][] matrix,
                                               int targetAttribute,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<AttributeEntropy> attEnt,
                                               boolean flag)
        Parameters:
        matrix - : The Dataset in the form of a numeric matrix which is returned from the formMatrix() method
        targetAttribute - : The Parent node at the current level
        attEnt - : The arrayList of Attribute Entropy objects.
        flag - : will be true if we are implementing random forest i.e random selection of attributes. False otherwise
        Returns:
        Tree of ID3

      • findA

        public static int findA(int[][] matrix,
                        java.util.ArrayList<AttributeEntropy> attEnt,
                        int[] attributeToConsider)
        Parameters:
        matrix - : The Dataset in the form of a numeric matrix which is returned from the formMatrix() method
        attEnt - : An array of objects which contain the entropy of each attribute
        attributeToConsider - : An array of attributes to be considered while choosing the next node.
        Returns:
        the attribute with the lowest entropy, which will form the root at the current level

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(int val,
                               int[] arr)
        Parameters:
        val - : key to be searched
        arr - : data in which we have to search
        Returns:
        an utility function which says whether an element exists in the array or not.

      • createDataSet

        public static java.util.ArrayList<int[][]> createDataSet(int attribute,
                                                         int[][] matrix)
        Parameters:
        attribute - : The attribute on the basis of which we are dividing the data matrix
        matrix - : The Dataset in the form of a numeric matrix which is returned from the formMatrix() method
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Matrices with data divided according to the unique values that the passed argument attribute can take.

      • formMatrix

        public static void formMatrix(int[][] matrix,
                              java.util.ArrayList<DataSet> data)
        Parameters:
        matrix - : The matrix which is to be filled
        data - : The Dataset in the form of a numeric matrix which is returned from the formMatrix() method Fills the matrix with the updated values according to the values in the DataRef.

      • calcAccuracy

        public static void calcAccuracy(int[][] testData,
                                Tree root)
        Parameters:
        testData - : The matrix filled according to the testing data
        root - : The root node of the formed ID3 tree. Prints the accuracy of the model.

                               java.util.ArrayList<DataSet> data)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:

        data - : The ArrayList of data objects which is to be populated on the basis of data
        Throws:

      • calcSplit

        public static int calcSplit(java.util.ArrayList<DataSet> data,
                            java.lang.String param)
        Parameters:
        data - : Data passed as a list of DataSet Objects
        param - : parameter for which split is supposed to be calculated
        Returns:
        split : returns the value on which split should happen

      • checkPN

        public static int checkPN(int[][] matrix)
        Parameters:
        matrix - : The Dataset in the form of a numeric matrix which is returned from the formMatrix() method
        Returns:
        checks whether a matrix (result of a divide) contains only positively classified examples, negatively classified examples or a mix of those. This is to handle the base cases of the recursion

      • generateRandomAttr

        public static int[] generateRandomAttr(int limit,
                                       int length)
        Parameters:
        limit - : Random numbers will be generated between 0 - Limit
        length - : 'Length' number of random numbers will be generated
        Returns:
        An array of randomly chosen 'length' numbers within the range 0-limit (both inclusive). The values will not repeat
